findings.title: Symbol names can be improved
findings.description: Suggestion to limit symbol names to 3-5 letters.

findings.title: Code Complexity check on line 582
findings.description: _reflectFee Private functional can be clubbed to reduce code complexity and gas fees on line 582 with function _transferStandard.

findings.title: Owner variable is shadowed and used multiple times in the contract
findings.description: The Owner variable is shadowed and used multiple times in the contract, suggested to use different variable names to remove discrepancy.

findings.title: Uniswap Router Address Update
findings.description: The Uniswap router address can be set as a variable and updated with a function, which may cause issues if the contract is updated or version changed in the future.

findings.title: Function can be used directly instead of using extra variable
findings.description: The function can be used directly without declaring an extra variable.
